message.content:
{"id": "14943", 
"title": "Bug 14943: Code Assist does not respect platform line ends", 
"description": "When using code assist to create a for loop with a temporary variable, the resulting code has LF linefeeds on a Windows machine instead of the expected CRLF line endings.", 
"OB": "To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:\n1. Open the code editor.\n2. Start typing a for loop statement.\n3. Use code assist to automatically generate the for loop with a temporary variable.", 
"EB": "The expected behavior is that the code assist feature should respect the platform line ends and generate code with the appropriate line endings (CRLF on Windows).", 
"SR": "To fix this issue, the following steps can be taken:\n1. Investigate the code assist feature to identify the cause of the incorrect line endings.\n2. Update the code assist functionality to correctly respect the platform line ends and generate code with the appropriate line endings based on the user's operating system."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '14943', 'title': 'Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends', 'description': 'Bug 14943Code Assist does not respect platform line ends ', 'OB': 'Used code assist to create a for loop with temporary variable.The resulting code has LF as linefeeds on a windows machine. ', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'I performed the following scenario:1. Created a new class2. Added a method.3. Defined a local variable for an array4. '}
